original_title: Â¡Viva Madrid, que es mi pueblo!
overview: The bullfighter Marcial Lalanda financed and starred in this film about the rivalry between two bullfighters for the ill-fated love of the same woman. It features scenes of bullfights shot by Enrique Blanco using polychromatic film for the first time in Spain. Considered one of the greatest Spanish silent films.
title: Long Live Madrid, Which Is My Town!
